string: 8) Place sample slide in custom vapour chamber as previously described by O’Rourke et al, and evenly pipette 650 μL of a 50:50 mix of 50 mmol ammonium bicarbonate/100% acetonitrile onto the centre paper tab.
refer: The phrase "as previously described" refers to the method of placing the sample slide in a custom vapour chamber, which was described by O'Rourke et al.
